slide.title: PHP 8.5: Closures in Constant Expressions
slide.example:
<?php
final class Country
{
	$[\Validator\Custom(static function ($countryCode) {
		return \preg_match('/^[a-z]{2,3}$/', $countryCode);
	})]
	public string $countryCode;
}
?>

list.bullet: They may not include variables from the surrounding scope.
